Package com.fdmgroup.javaproject.service

Class TransactionService

java.lang.Object
com.fdmgroup.javaproject.service.TransactionService
@Service public class TransactionService extends Object
TransactionService is responsible for all methods related to manipulating the Transaction entity in the database.
Author:
May Lwin
